name: WP fade in text news
author: Gopi Ramasamy

sections.description:
Everybody loves fading in and out; this plugin will create the fade-in and out effect in the text. It is an superb excellent way to transition between announcements. Admin can add more announcement using plugin text management area.

Check official website for live demo http://www.gopiplus.com/work/2011/04/22/wordpress-plugin-wp-fadein-text-news/

  • Live Demo
  • More Info
  • User Comments

This plugin will create the fadein and out effect in the text. It is an superb excellent way to transition between announcements.

  • Easy to customize.
  • Short code available for page.
  • Short code available for post.
  • Supports localization

We have three options to install and configure this fade in text plugin.

Translators

  • English (en_EN) – Gopi Ramasamy
  • Polish (pl_PL) – Abdul Sattar
sections.installation:
Method 1

File upload using ftp

Method 2

Direct upload from website admin

Method 3

Upload from website admin with ZIP file

Configuration

We have 3 option to configure this plugin click here to see more info.
sections.faq:
Q1. How to arrange the plugin fade-in setting?
Q2. How to update the existing plugin text?
Q3. Is possible to add the plugin more than one time in the same post or page?
Q4. How to group the announcement?
Q6. How to change the fade-in text CSS?
Q7. My question is not listed in this FAQ?

More info : click to go
sections.changelog:
Version 1.0

First version

Version 2.0

FadeIn_bFadeOutt and quote problem solved.

Version 3.0

Now we can add HTML content in the textarea…

Version 6.0

Tested up to 3.4

Version 7.0

Tested up to 3.4.1
JavaScript loaded by using the wp_enqueue_scripts hook (instead of the init hook)
Slight change in the short code, Please find the new short code for your gallery

Version 8.0

New demo link, http://www.gopiplus.com

Version 9.0

Tested up to 3.5

Version 10.0

Tested up to 3.6
Added some security feature.
New admin look.

Version 10.1

  1. Tested up to 3.8
  2. Now this plugin supports localization (or internationalization). i.e. option to translate into other languages.
    Plugin *.po file (FadeIn.po) available in the languages folder. Translators Welcome.
  3. Supports network multisite website (Manual table creation required).

Version 10.2

  1. Tested up to 3.9
  2. Small security update.

Version 10.3

  1. Tested up to 4.0
  2. Added option to enter expiration date.

Version 10.4

  1. Tested up to 4.1

Version 10.5

  1. Tested up to 4.2.2

Version 10.6

  1. Tested up to 4.3

Version 10.7

  1. Tested up to 4.3.1
  2. Text Domain slug has been added for Language Packs.

Version 10.8

  1. Tested up to 4.4

Version 10.9

  1. Tested up to 4.5
  2. Sanitization added for all input value.

Version 11.0

  1. Tested up to 4.6

Version 11.1

  1. Tested up to 4.7

Version 11.2

  1. Tested up to 4.8

Version 11.3

  1. Tested up to 4.9

Version 11.4

  1. Tested up to 5.2
  2. Uninstall option added. All plugin reference and plugin table will be cleared during uninstallation.
  3. Converted admin JS alert message into WP class file.

Version 11.5

  1. Tested up to 5.3

Version 11.6

  1. Tested up to 5.4

Version 11.7

  1. Tested up to 5.5

Version 11.8

  1. Tested up to 5.7

Version 11.9

  1. Tested up to 5.8
  2. Use the plugin short code in the widget.

Version 12.0

  1. Tested up to 5.9

Version 12.1

  1. Tested up to 6.4
